name: Pahela Boisakh
short_description: Embrace Bengali New Year with our event services â€“ traditional decor, cultural performances, and delectable cuisine.
long_description: Experience the vibrant spirit of Pahela Baishakh (Bengali New Year) with our event services. We offer meticulous planning, traditional decor that captures the essence of Bengali culture, captivating cultural performances, and a delightful spread of authentic Bengali cuisine. Celebrate this auspicious occasion in style and create lasting memories with us.
standard_service: Our standard service package includes essential event planning and coordination, venue selection and setup, thematic decor and lighting, live music and cultural performances, catering services, and more.
premium_service: Upgrade to our premium service package for an enhanced experience. You'll get everything in the standard package, plus additional features like fireworks display, cultural food and beverage services, guest speaker arrangements, and more.
custom_service: Create a personalized event experience with our custom service. You can define your unique requirements, select specific services from our offerings, and tailor the event to your preferences. Contact us to discuss your custom event plan.

name: Pahela Falgun
short_description: Create a vibrant Pahela Falgun celebration with our event planning services. Colorful decor, cultural performances, and more!
long_description: Elevate your Pahela Falgun celebration with our comprehensive event planning services. We'll transform your venue into a burst of vibrant colors, incorporating traditional floral motifs and cultural decor. Enjoy lively performances of Bengali music, dance, and poetry, creating an authentic ambiance. Savor mouthwatering Bengali cuisine and engage in interactive activities that celebrate the arrival of spring. Let us take care of every detail, ensuring your Pahela Falgun event is a memorable and culturally rich experience for all attendees.
